project.name: qdb
project.description:
IntelliJ integration to trigger maven steps to build "qdb" via Ant.
To build "qdb" from IntelliJ before every test run: * Install the Ant plugin: https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/23025-ant * View -> Tool Windows -> Ant * Right click on "qdb-build" and select "Execute on" * Select "Before Compilation" to enable calling the "qdb-build" target as part of every build.
In case of build errors, run "mvn package" from the command line manually.
You can also run the maven target to build the `qdb-ent` library explicitly:
mvn -pl core org.questdb:rust-maven-plugin:build@qdb-build
